sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The curl package contains curl, curl-config and the curl library.

sect3.title: curl
sect3.para: curl is a client that can get documents from or send documents to any of the following protocols: HTTP, HTTPS (needs openssl), FTP, GOPHER, DICT, TELNET, LDAP (needs openldap) or FILE.

sect3.title: curl-config
sect3.para: curl-config prints information about the last compile, like libraries linked to and prefix setting.

sect3.title: curl library
sect3.para: libcurl provides the functionality of curl to other programs.
